meanings.definition: To make an effort to achieve or complete something.
meanings.sent1: She is attempting to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always attempts to fix things around the house.
meanings.sent3: The cat is attempting to catch the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: The young bird is attempting to fly for the first time.
meanings.sent5: The students are attempting to solve a challenging math problem together.

meanings.definition: An act of trying to achieve something, typically without success.
meanings.sent1: His attempt to climb the tree ended in a fall.
meanings.sent2: The team made an attempt to score a goal in the last minute.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's attempt to steal the bird's food was unsuccessful.
meanings.sent4: The child's attempt to build a sandcastle was washed away by the tide.
meanings.sent5: The attempt to break the world record fell short by just a few seconds.
